labels.reason: The guide provides detailed steps, troubleshooting advice, and information on where to buy replacement parts. It also advises on what to do if the fix doesn't work.
The guide includes safety warnings about disconnecting power and water supply, wearing PPE, and being cautious of residual water.
The tools listed (screwdriver, pliers, adjustable wrench) are common household tools that a typical homeowner would have.
The solution is concise with only 6 steps, which is appropriate for an intermediate task. No specialty tools are required.
The guide specifically addresses the problem of a water inlet valve not functioning or leaking, providing relevant and specific instructions.
The tips are practical and specific, offering advice on purchasing compatible parts and handling components during the repair.
